description:
Protected Areas across Jamaica, including game reserves, protected areas, marine parks, national parks and forest reserves. Both declared and proposed protected areas are shown, along with details pertaining to the act under which each was declared and the date of declaration.

National Environment and Planning Agency (NEPA) and Mona GeoInformatics Institute (MGI)
name: BV_JAM_Jamaica, Caribbean, Protected Areas, 2010, 1:1,280,000
